wh.warhammer.info:
- With right click, you can deal AoE attack 
   in range of 2 blocks around you. 
- Damage of this attack is 60% of normal attack and 
   you can do it only once every 2 seconds
wh.dagger.info:
- Dagger weapons have decreased attack range. 
- But to compensate this, if you hold it in your off-hand, 
   you can deal more damage with sword-type items 
   like sword, rapier, etc. 
- Also if you right click you deal additional damage. 
- If you dont hold sword in your main hand, 
   when rightclicked, you can throw the dagger.
wh.spear.info:
- Spear weapons have increased attack range. 
- You can also throw it with right click, but be warned, 
   it will decrease durability of spear by large amount.
